snippet.textDisplay: Wow Cody, Our entire group and there's about 35 of us are not liking this game AT ALL. Not seeing any Cooperation at all. Dark forest approach by every player. Complete Gank and Grief, toxic environment. Culture of the game is terrible from what weve seen so far. A PVE only option, OPTION, would make the game sell 1000x more copies than it will. As is this is JUST A TARKOV clone.

snippet.textDisplay:
I'm actually disappointed in this title. Originally it was presented as a co-op PvE game. But it seems like the creators couldn't give us meaningful content. So instead they let us be the meaningful content by murdering one another for no good reason cause they're too lazy or not experienced enough to do so themselves. It's the cowardly cop-out method to let players (multiple) create their own entertainment with other players. Because they don't know how.
Facts.
snippet.textOriginal:
I'm actually disappointed in this title. Originally it was presented as a co-op PvE game. But it seems like the creators couldn't give us meaningful content. So instead they let us be the meaningful content by murdering one another for no good reason cause they're too lazy or not experienced enough to do so themselves. It's the cowardly cop-out method to let players (multiple) create their own entertainment with other players. Because they don't know how.
Facts.

snippet.textDisplay: For me the whole apocalypse PvP stuff never made sense when thereâ€™s a common enemy.  Like why thin the already dying race of humans.  Would it not make more sense to help each other?  But as much as Iâ€™d love for there to be a casual-friendly server there are those manipulative people that would definitely lead a machine horde toward another player to let them kill them off and then loot the body.  Iâ€™m not NaÃ¯ve, i know that finding another â€œfriendlyâ€ player is about as likely as stepping on a landmine that doesnâ€™t explode.  But iâ€™ll do my best to be that bigger person and help other Raiders, even if they arenâ€™t on my team.
snippet.textOriginal: For me the whole apocalypse PvP stuff never made sense when thereâ€™s a common enemy.  Like why thin the already dying race of humans.  Would it not make more sense to help each other?  But as much as Iâ€™d love for there to be a casual-friendly server there are those manipulative people that would definitely lead a machine horde toward another player to let them kill them off and then loot the body.  Iâ€™m not NaÃ¯ve, i know that finding another â€œfriendlyâ€ player is about as likely as stepping on a landmine that doesnâ€™t explode. snippet.textDisplay: Game was ruined before it even comes out when they changed a 5 year project that was funded by the community on kick starter from a PvE open world survival experience vs giant alien robots like gen zero but better, Which everyone wanted or they wouldn't have supported it, To a 2 years of silences and a poor change of core game aspects to a PvPvE crappy copy paste extraction shooter that wont last 2 months on steam. PvP players might like this changed but the 200.000 ppl that paid to support the PvE game are pissed and want there money back, Not everything needs to be PvP and it getting boring. All of this because the game "The finals" a game made to fund arc raiders along side the kick starter got success they do a 180 and lied to everyone.
snippet.textOriginal: Game was ruined before it even comes out when they changed a 5 year project that was funded by the community on kick starter from a PvE open world survival experience vs giant alien robots like gen zero but better, Which everyone wanted or they wouldn't have supported it, To a 2 years of silences and a poor change of core game aspects to a PvPvE crappy copy paste extraction shooter that wont last 2 months on steam.
